data.title: Siege of Tarnovo
data.meta_description: The siege of Tarnovo occurred in the spring of 1393 and resulted in a decisive Ottoman victory. With the fall of its capital, the Bulgarian Empire was reduced to a few fortresses along the Danube.
data.text:
1393 capture of the Bulgarian city of Tarnovo by the Ottoman Empire / From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
